entry.title: Bit by Bit is Borned.
entry.summary:
Greetings. I'll be using this blog format to make updates about code and projects I am working on, and how they are progressing.

This is my first github-pages site, so bear with me if I completely screw the pooch. What follows is a quick list of things I'm working on:

  1. Raspberry Pi Thin Clients in a production RDP Farm.
  2. Raspberry Pi Dead-Drop boxes.
  3. Mini-UAVs with distributed processing.
  4. A Backpack Comp.
  5. CTRL-H/Laserbird, a hackerspace in PDX.
  6. A virtualized multiple desktop environment for Oculus DK2.
  7. A game thing, based on multidimensional theory (loosely) and rebooting the planet.
  8. Integrating hacking tools into sweeter hacker tools. (Pen automation/over-engineering type crap. I suck at it right now.)
  9. Rooting an Alcatel W800O. (Pretty much failed.)
  10. Connecting things to other things they shouldn't be connected to.

Email me at bitassassin@aesirpss.com
